verses.verse: Now <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2296>"Gird<s%> up your <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6378>flask<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to Ramoth-gilead.

"When you <S%H935>arrive<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H7200>search<s%> out <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> in and bid him <S%H6965>arise<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> him to an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>room.<s%>

"Then <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6378>flask<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> it on his <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> "'Then <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> and <S%H5127>flee<s%> and do not <S%H2442>wait.<s%>"
So the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man,<s%> the <S%H5288>servant<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to Ramoth-gilead.

When he <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have a <S%H1697>word<s%> for you, O <S%H8269>captain.<s%>" And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "For <S%H4310>which<s%> [one] of us?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "For you, O <S%H8269>captain.<s%>"

And he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he <S%H3332>poured<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> on his <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> [even] <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

'And you shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> your <S%H113>master,<s%> that I may <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of My <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel.<s%>

'For the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> shall perish, and I will <S%H6>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H3772>Ahab<s%> <S%H256>every<s%> <S%H8366>male<s%> <S%H8366><s%> person both <S%H7023>bond<s%> and <S%H6113>free<s%> in <S%H5800>Israel.<s%>

'And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> and like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H281>Ahijah.<s%>

'And the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> in the <S%H2506>territory<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> [her.]' "Then he <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> and <S%H5127>fled.<s%>

Now <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out to the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of his <S%H113>master,<s%> and one <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Is all <S%H7965>well<s%>? <S%H4069>Why<s%> did <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7696>mad<s%> <S%H7696>fellow<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to you?" And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "You <S%H3045>know<s%> [very well] the <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H7879>talk.<s%>"

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is a <S%H8267>lie,<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> us <S%H4994>now.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"Thus<s%> and <S%H2088>thus<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> "'"

Then they <S%H4116>hurried<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> and <S%H7760>placed<s%> it <S%H8478>under<s%> him on the <S%H1634>bare<s%> <S%H4609>steps,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3058>"Jehu<s%> is <S%H4427>king!<s%>"

So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3141>Joram.<s%> Now <S%H3141>Joram<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H8104>defending<s%> Ramoth-gilead <S%H4480>against<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Aram,<s%>

but <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3088>Joram<s%> had <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed<s%> of the <S%H4347>wounds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H761>Arameans<s%> had <S%H5221>inflicted<s%> on him when he <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Aram.<s%> So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> this is your <S%H5315>mind,<s%> [then] let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H6412>one<s%> <S%H6412>escape<s%> [or] <S%H3318>leave<s%> <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> [it] in <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>"

Then <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H7392>rode<s%> in a <S%H7392>chariot<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> for <S%H3141>Joram<s%> was <S%H7901>lying<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> And <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3141>Joram.<s%>

Now the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> on the <S%H4026>tower<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H8229>company<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> as he <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H8229>company.<s%>" And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> a <S%H7395>horseman<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> him to <S%H7122>meet<s%> them and let him <S%H559>say,<s%> 'Is it <S%H7965>peace<s%>?'"

So a <S%H7392>horseman<s%> <S%H5483><s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> 'Is it <S%H7965>peace<s%>?'" And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> have you to do with <S%H7965>peace<s%>? <S%H5437>Turn<s%> <S%H413>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> me." And the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H5046>reported,<s%> "The <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to them, but he did not <S%H7725>return.<s%>"

Then he <S%H7971>sent<s%> out a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H7392>horseman,<s%> <S%H5483><s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> to them and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> 'Is it <S%H7965>peace<s%>?'" And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> have you to do with <S%H7965>peace<s%>? <S%H5437>Turn<s%> <S%H413>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> me."

And the <S%H6822>watchman<s%> <S%H5046>reported,<s%> "He <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>even<s%> to them, and he did not <S%H7725>return;<s%> and the <S%H4491>driving<s%> is like the <S%H4491>driving<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi,<s%> for he <S%H5090>drives<s%> <S%H7697>furiously.<s%>"

Then <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H631>"Get<s%> <S%H631>ready.<s%>" And they <S%H631>made<s%> his <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H631>ready.<s%> And <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out, <S%H376>each<s%> in his <S%H7393>chariot,<s%> and they <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> him in the <S%H2513>property<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> that he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is it <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%>?" And he <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H5704>so<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> as the <S%H2183>harlotries<s%> of your <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> and her <S%H3785>witchcrafts<s%> are so <S%H7227>many<s%>?"

So <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H2015>reined<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H2015>about<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H5127>fled<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> "[There is] <S%H4820>treachery,<s%> O <S%H274>Ahaziah!<s%>"

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H4390>drew<s%> his <S%H7198>bow<s%> with his <S%H4390>full<s%> <S%H3027>strength<s%> and <S%H5221>shot<s%> <S%H3088>Joram<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H2220>arms;<s%> and the <S%H2678>arrow<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>through<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he <S%H3766>sank<s%> in his <S%H7393>chariot.<s%>

Then [Jehu] <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H920>Bidkar<s%> his <S%H7991>officer,<s%> <S%H5375>"Take<s%> [him] up and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into the <S%H2513>property<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite,<s%> for I <S%H2142>remember<s%> when you and I were <S%H7392>riding<s%> <S%H6776>together<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> his father, that the <S%H1>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>laid<s%> <S%H5375>this<s%> <S%H2088>oracle<s%> <S%H9294>against<s%> him:

<S%H518>'Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H570>yesterday<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'and I will <S%H9608>repay<s%> you in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2513>property,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> then, <S%H5375>take<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into the <S%H2513>property,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "

When <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> [this,] he <S%H5127>fled<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%> And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5221>"Shoot<s%> him <S%H1571>too,<s%> in the <S%H4818>chariot.<s%>" [So they shot him] at the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H1483>Gur,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is at <S%H2991>Ibleam.<s%> But he <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Then his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7392>carried<s%> him in a <S%H7392>chariot<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his <S%H6900>grave<s%> with his fathers in the <S%H1>city<s%> of <S%H5892>David.<s%>

Now in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3141>Joram,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

When <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [of it,] and she <S%H7760>painted<s%> <S%H6320><s%> her <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H3190>adorned<s%> her <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H8259>looked<s%> out the <S%H2474>window.<s%>
And as <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is it <S%H7965>well,<s%> <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> your master's <S%H2026>murderer<s%>?"

Then he <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H2474>window<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> is on my <S%H854>side<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%>?" And <S%H8147>two<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5631>officials<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H8259>down<s%> at him.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8058>"Throw<s%> her <S%H8058>down.<s%>" So they <S%H8058>threw<s%> her <S%H8058>down,<s%> and <S%H4480>some<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%> was <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall<s%> and on the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and he <S%H7429>trampled<s%> her under foot.

When he <S%H935>came<s%> in, he <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6485>"See<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H779>cursed<s%> <S%H779>woman<s%> and <S%H6912>bury<s%> her, for she is a king's <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>"

And they <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> her, but they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3588>more<s%> <S%H518><s%> of her <S%H3588>than<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H1538>skull<s%> and the <S%H7272>feet<s%> and the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of her <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

Therefore they <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> him. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1931>"This<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by His <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'In the <S%H2506>property<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel;<s%>

and the <S%H5038>corpse<s%> of <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> shall be as <S%H1828>dung<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H2506>property<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> <S%H834>so<s%> they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is <S%H348>Jezebel.<s%>"' "
